about_the_game:
Angularis is similar to Tetris, but based on triangles instead of squares. This makes it possible and necessary to also use diagonal movements. Challenge yourself to "Think Diagonally" and try this new spin on a classic puzzle game.
6 different types of shapes come falling down in random order one after the other.
Your task is to rotate each shapes and move it left or right so that they all fall nicely and fill the game board.
Once you have filled a horizontal row completely it will be cleared and you earn points and reach the next level.
The speed of the falling parts increases with each level.
